metadata.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Leonardo Michelangelo Raphael Half Zip Hoodie Toddler to Big Kid
features: Officially licensed Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles TMNT toddler boys cute, comfy and stylish long sleeve graphic hooded sweatshirt
Ribbed sleeve cuffs for a better fit; Awesome screen print design; Comfortable hood lining; Ribbed waist for a better fit; Quarter zip with durable and strong quality plastic tooth zipper
Soft and comfy hooded sweatshirts that are easy for children to dress in; made to be a durable and long-lasting winter outfit essential for your athletic child
Comfortable and fun youth outerwear with cute and playful character designs that your kid will love to be cozy in when it's jumper and sweater weather
Perfect for birthday gift, every day wear, Christmas holiday gift, outdoor play and cold weather
description: Don your shell and get your child ready for the action-packed adventure of a lifetime with this Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles [CategoryDescriptionLong]! Leo, Raph, Mike and Donnie need your little one’s help to save New York City. Join the brothers as they learn the art of ninjutsu and being a shadow warrior from their sensei, Master Splinter. Watch as these cartoon characters’ power and stealth comes to life through your child in this TMNT outfit. Your little one will love this [PieceDescriptionKeywords] featuring their favorite comic book ninjas.

title: The Northwest Company Officially Licensed NFL Deep Slant Micro Raschel Throw Blanket, 46" x 60"
